title: Privacy Policy
intro: Schedulizer ("we", "us", or "our") operates the Schedulizer platform. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly when using our platform:
items: Account information: name, email address, and password
Business information: organization name, services offered, and working hours
Scheduling data: appointments, time blocks, and availability
Phone number: when provided for WhatsApp notifications
Payment information: processed securely through Stripe (we do not store card details)

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide and maintain the scheduling platform
Send appointment confirmations, reminders, and notifications via email or WhatsApp
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Improve our services and user experience
Communicate important updates about the platform

whatsapp.title: 3. WhatsApp & Meta Integration
whatsapp.content: When you or your customers opt in to WhatsApp notifications:
items: Phone numbers are shared with Meta Platforms (WhatsApp Business API) to deliver messages
Messages include appointment details such as date, time, and service name
We use WhatsApp message templates approved by Meta for notifications
Inbound messages from customers are processed to enable chatbot-based scheduling
Conversation session data is stored temporarily (30 minutes) and automatically deleted
Meta may process data according to their own privacy policy
whatsapp.metaLink: For more information about how Meta handles data, visit Meta's Privacy Policy.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Tracking
items: Language preference: stored in localStorage to remember your language choice
Authentication tokens: essential cookies to keep you logged in
Error tracking: Sentry for monitoring application errors and performance
We do not use advertising cookies or third-party tracking for marketing purposes

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We share your data only with the following third-party services necessary to operate the platform:
items: Stripe: payment processing
Resend: email delivery
Meta (WhatsApp Business API): WhatsApp message delivery
Sentry: error monitoring and performance tracking
sharing.additional: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Scheduling data is kept for the duration of your subscription. WhatsApp chatbot session data is automatically deleted after 30 minutes of inactivity. You may request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access the personal data we hold about you
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Export your data in a portable format
Withdraw consent for WhatsApp notifications at any time
Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encrypted connections (HTTPS), secure authentication, webhook signature verification for WhatsApp messages, and secure payment processing through Stripe.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, contact us at:

updates.title: 10. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice on our platform. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
